title: scoutsheirbrug.be
description: The website for Scouts Heirbrug, using Jekyll and markdown files for the content. Started in 2020 because our current website theme was outdated and too generic.

title: Totemapp
description: Mobile app to discover all the different totems and traits. Made during my internship at Scouts en Gidsen Vlaanderen.

title: HO-Gids
description: Mobile app to give information to scouts leaders during Herfstontmoeting, a yearly event organized by Scouts en Gidsen Vlaanderen. Made as a volunteer of Ploeg IT then later improved during my internship.

title: Speel op Veilig
description: Simple mobile app with information about rules and suggestions for scouting. Made during my internship at Scouts en Gidsen Vlaanderen.

title: Attest Gen
description: Tool to generate a PDF based on some fields and a signature. I am using this as a scouts leader.

title: NBT Viewer
description: A VSCode extension to open binary NBT files, which are used in Minecraft. With fancy previews for structure and world files. Has reached 18K installs.

title: misode.github.io
description: Website with tons of useful tools and resources for people making Minecraft data packs. Started in 2019 as a loot table maker but it has now grown to 1K daily visitors.

title: Worldgen Tools
description: A VSCode extension to preview some noise and math JSON files used when developing a Minecraft data pack that modifies world generation.

title: Datapack Upgader
description: Tool to automatically fix breaking changes in a data pack between major Minecraft version.

title: Gamemode 4 Datapacks
description: A large collection of modifications to Minecraft. I joined the team in 2018, but now I mainly do automation and maintenance tasks.

title: gm4.co
description: A website distributing and advertising the Gamemode 4 modules. Originally written by Sparks

title: Spyglass
description: A language server for Minecraft data packs. Written mainly by SPGoding but I have contributed a fair amount.

title: Deepslate
description: A typescript library for rendering and emulating parts of Minecraft. Used in various of my other projects.

title: Deepslate Rust
description: Experiment seeing how much faster a rust implementation of Deepslate could be using WASM in the browser. This was my first project in Rust. It turned out to give a 2x performance improvement, but development in Rust was too slow compared to TypeScript.

title: Mcmeta
description: Processed, version controlled history of Minecraft's generated data and assets. Autoomated python script that runs for every new version.

title: Minecraft Bingo
description: Website where everyone can generate a random card of random events that could happen during Minecraft Live.

title: Worldgen Profiling
description: A Minecraft Java mod that hooks into the JFR profiling system to provide more details for world generation.

title: Advent of Code
description: Participating in the Advent of Code competitive coding puzzles. In 2022 I completed all the days for the first time.

title: Brigadier TypeScript
description: A TypeScript port of Mojang/brigadier. This was my first TypeScript project and what got me to love the language.

title: Skymode4
description: A custom Minecraft map started in 2017, never completely finished. The goal was a skyblock map integrating different Gamemode 4 modules.

title: Mijnlieff
description: Multiplayer board game using JavaFX. Made as a project at UGent.

title: Tile Dungeon
description: Top-down Java shooter game. This was my first project, made in 2016 when I was starting to learn Java.
